title: Hollyoaks star Jennifer Metcalfe confirms Later spin-off will be 'gory and racy'
text:

Hollyoaks actress Jennifer Metcalfe has teased what fans can expect from the returning spin-off Hollyoaks Later.

The Mercedes McQueen star confirmed she was involved in the special, that is making a comeback for a one-off episode in January.

Mercedes will be shot next week in dramatic scenes as part of a new whodunnit, while the culprit has yet to be confirmed.

But despite the actress confirming her character would be injured and left in a coma for three weeks, it seems she survives the ordeal as she is set to appear in Hollyoaks Later in the beginning of next year.

(Image: PA)

Speaking to Mirror Online and other publications at a recent Hollyoaks press event, Jennifer confirmed new details.

She said: "Yes! I'm looking forward to it. I've just read the scripts and they're brilliant.

"We haven't done Hollyoaks Later for a few years now."

(Image: LIMEPICTURES)

(Image: Channel 4 PA)

Jennifer added of the specific scenes: "We're not going abroad for it – it's not a glamorous location at all! But each Later comes with something different.

"This time it pushes it with a bit more gore. It's gory and racy. It's everything that you want!"

It comes after the actress teased what was to come for Mercedes, after a shooting will leave her fighting for her life.

(Image: Channel 4 PA)

Speaking about the scenes and the dramatic fallout, Jennifer told us: "[The injuries are] pretty bad. She ends up in a coma for three weeks which was fantastic.

"After doing all these epic monologues in front of everybody, I literally go into a coma for three weeks so it's like three blocks of me laid in bed all day.

"Way too much Internet shopping... there was nothing else to do, but I got to lay in bed for three weeks."

Hollyoaks airs weeknights at 6:30pm on Channel 4, with the next episode at 7pm on E4.
description: EXCLUSIVE: Hollyoaks' Mercedes McQueen actress Jennifer Metcalfe has teased her appearance in spin-off Hollyoaks Later
